reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of GEOB 102, GEOB 103. (Or 6 credits in the Faculty of Science (BIOL, CHEM, EOSC, PHYS).)
Note: This is a wait list section for GEOG 310, section 201, Term 2. You will be moved into active registration if space becomes available. Wait list does not guarantee placement in this course.
description: Concepts of environment, resources and sustainability; the roles of physical and human geography in understanding the interaction of humans and the environment; introduction to management of environment-resource systems.
